entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 30%
